lenders.name: Bookworm Service
lenders.loan_because: It's needed.
lenders.occupational_info:
Why buy books from us? We have a huge inventory of discounted brand new books that includes bestsellers as well as classics. On top of our discounted prices we do not charge a shipping fee. The posted price is all that you will be charged. One reason to order books directly from BookwormService.com is that our customers are automatically enrolled in our free rewards program that issues store credit for every purchase made.


Visit BookwormService.com & compare us today. With discounted new books, free shipping, & our free rewards program BookwormService.com is the best deal. 


Build your own bookstore...We are adding 100s of books daily, if you do not see the book you need then just contact us & we will add it to our site. 



Please email us (readbooks@bookwormservice.com) if there are any questions.


Use the coupon code "Kiva" to receive an additional discount. 


thank you, 

Bookworm Service

lenders.name: Cullen Chambers
lenders.loan_because: I can!
lenders.occupational_info:
Perform a variety of editorial duties, such as laying out, indexing, and revising content of written materials, in preparation for final publication. Includes technical elements.
Formulates policy; plans, coordinates, and directs editorial activities; and supervises workers who assist in selecting and preparing material for publication in magazines, trade journals, house organs, and related publications. Direct activities of production, circulation, or promotion personnel. Prepare news or public relations releases, special brochures, and similar materials. Represents publication at professional and community functions. 
Determines theme of issue and gathers related material. Writes or assigns staff members or freelance writers to write articles, reports, editorials, reviews, and other material. Read and evaluates material submitted for publication consideration. Secure graphic material from picture sources and assigns artists and photographers to produce pictures and illustrations. Assigns staff member, or personally interviews individuals and attends gatherings, to obtain items for publication, verify facts, and clarify information. Assign research and other editorial duties to assistants.  
Confer with executives, department heads, and editorial staff to formulate policy, coordinate department activities, establish production schedules, solve publication problems, and discuss makeup plans and organizational changes. Organize material, plans overall and individual page layouts, and selects type. Mark dummy pages to indicate position and size of printed and graphic material. Review final proofs and approves or makes changes. Review and evaluates work of staff members and makes recommendations and changes. Read copy to detect errors in spelling, punctuation, and syntax. 
Verify facts, dates, and statistics, using standard reference sources. Rewrite or modify copy to conform to publication's style and editorial policy and mark copy for typesetter, using standard symbols to indicate how type should be set. 
Read galley and page proofs to detect errors and indicates corrections, using standard proofreading symbols. Confer with authors regarding changes made to manuscript. Select and crop photographs and illustrative materials to conform to space and subject matter requirements. Prepare page layouts to position and space articles and illustrations. Write or rewrite headlines, captions, columns, articles, and stories according to publication requirements. Initiate or reply to correspondence regarding material published or being considered for publication. Read and evaluate submitted manuscripts. 
Review financial reports and takes appropriate action with respect to costs and revenues. Perform duties of one or more subordinate editors and direct activities of advertising, circulation, or production personnel if developments dictates.  
Secures, selects, and coordinates publication of manuscripts in book form: reviews submitted manuscript, determines demand based on consumer trends and personal knowledge, and makes recommendations regarding procurement and revision. Confers with author and publication team to arrange purchase and details, such as publication date, royalties, and number of copies to be printed. Coordinate design and production activities. Assign and supervise editorial staff. Contract design and production or personally design and produce book.  
Prepare indices for books and other publications: reads material to determine which items should be in index. Arrange topical or alphabetical list of index items, according to page or chapter, indicating location of item in text. Classify items of topical interest, and inserts cross references in index to refer reader to related subjects appearing elsewhere in text. Direct activities of clerical staff engaged in typing index, filing subject-cards, and performing related duties. Prepare related items, such as glossaries, bibliographies, and explanatory footnotes, following literary style of manuscript author.

lenders.occupational_info: i help build houses for people, and i also learn something new everyday from books i read.

lenders.name: Curtis
lenders.loan_because: I want to make money

lenders.name: Mihályházi
lenders.loan_because: Hello! I loan, because for my new job I need a car, and now I havn't posibility to buy, because I finished my resources.
lenders.occupational_info: Work whith people , who is working in HoRe Ca (hotel, restaurant, catering sector)

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because: I have a number of successful enterprises, and I learned long ago that getting money is never easy.  I believe that a majority of people are good; having the same sense of responsibility when it comes to debt: most will be grateful for what they have, and even more grateful for being thought of as trustworthy.  As human beings, we share collective dreams.  Together, lets share the rewards.
lenders.occupational_info: I am, first and foremost, an entrepeneur.  I have a very successful web business I started in 1999.  It allows me the freedom to pursue my passion as an actor.  I also teach acting students of all ages from my home studio.

lenders.name: Courtney
lenders.loan_because: it feels good to step out and do something that most americans are to selfish, stingy and skeptic to.  Helping out others brings a joy to my heart. Being able to help others makes me smile when i feel i have nothing else to smile about.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student. I am studying Social Work.

lenders.name: Debra/James
lenders.loan_because: i want to share.

lenders.name: Tatiana
lenders.loan_because: “A society grows great when old men plant trees whose shade they know they shall never sit in.”

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: It's important to me to see other self starters around the world have the opportunity to grow through their own efforts.
lenders.occupational_info: I build mobile content services in the US.  Content services may be social networking services, music & video, app stores etc.

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.loan_because: People should help others when they are able.
lenders.occupational_info: I write computer programs that show information on maps.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I am able to.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because:
matthew 25: 30-46.

verses 44&45 encapsulate it: "Then they will reply, 'Lord, when did we ever see you hungry or thirsty or a stranger or naked or sick or in prison, and not help you?' "And he will answer, 'I tell you the truth, when you refused to help the least of these my brothers and sisters, you were refusing to help me.'
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a restaurant making and serving coffee and food for people

lenders.name: Gail & Rich
lenders.loan_because:
A hand up is better than a hand out.
The people who's stories I've read seem
to have purpose and direction and deserve to be enabled in the realization of thier goals.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: "Whatever you do for the least of these you do for me." - Jesus of Nazareth
lenders.occupational_info: I work in my church

lenders.name: Preston
lenders.loan_because: Being a small business owner, I know what it is like to want to create a better life for your family.  If I can simply loan someone a few dollars to better their life, it betters mine.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a retail clothing store that specializes in earth friendly fabrics and accessories.  Trying to limit the footprint that we all have on this planet.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I care.  This is another part of my efforts to support the millennium development goals; I also support the Episcopal Relief and Development agency, the Ahli Arab Hospital in Gaza and the Four Homes of Mercy for the severely disabled based in Jerusalem.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a software engineer with expertise in operating systems, cloud storage systems, web design, databases and embedded controllers. I live in San Jose, California, I am married and have two children.

lenders.name: Pranab
lenders.loan_because: I have always loved "sharing". I am not wealthy by any means but I have more resources and am more fortunate  than scores of humans on this planet. It is only fair to do my part to help those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: Scientific research (Computational Modeling,  Machine Learning, Computer Graphics, Information Visualization).

lenders.name: Raghav
lenders.loan_because: I believe that life is about helping each other to overcome differences with which we are born or which we get into, who knows if I would have been them. Human beings are a rare entity who have been embraced with emotions, feelings and the right to be happy or not. There is no reason for only some of us to be happy.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to be able to achieve my goal of making at least 876 600 lives happier before I die and I know that I will live till 100. You wonder where that number came from? ask me.

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people achieve their dreams

lenders.name: Anthony
lenders.loan_because: Every little bit from each person is a small benefit to a larger view
lenders.occupational_info: Just some dude

lenders.name: Drew
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.occupational_info: I work to protect animals and the environment.

lenders.name: Felipe
lenders.loan_because: "Be the change you want to see in the world.” Mahatma Gandhi

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: it's a great way to use my money

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: Trying to start my own small business while working a full-time job, I know how difficult it can be for entrepreneurs to get the funding they need to make their dreams come true.  But dreams don't have to be achieved alone.  A little money goes a long way, so I like to help out when I can.
lenders.occupational_info: During the day, I am a computer programmer at a medical software company.  In my free time, I am a game designer, and owner of WHE Games.

lenders.name: Kent
lenders.loan_because: I would like to share a little love around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people how to use information.

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: So many people have gone out of their way to help me in my life and business. I'd just like to pass it on.

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: it allows me to make a direct impact  and gives someone a chance to empower themselve.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with businesses to improve their processes and make their operations more efficient.

lenders.name: Enza Day Spa
lenders.loan_because: As a small business we know that it can be tough to start out.  We're committed to helping those in need and want to encourage growth and accomplishment!
lenders.occupational_info: As a South African inspired Day Spa in Canada, we focus our business on soothing body -mind -soul.  Our focus is on relaxation, stress relief, natural health and general well being.  We actively participate in our own community: offering a variety of de-stress programmes, supporting charities, Dragon Boat racing and encouraging an overall well-being.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: Teach a man to fish and he eats for a lifetime...

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: I can. And because I want to see the world change, one woman at a time. Feel free to send me gift certificates so that I can do even more. http://www.kiva.org/app.php?page=gift&action=giftPromotion

lenders.name: Nathan Perrin
lenders.loan_because: I can afford to.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a college student at one of the top liberal arts colleges in the US.

lenders.name: Baugh
lenders.loan_because: I want my students to understand that they can make a difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: high school teacher

lenders.name: Janos
lenders.loan_because: I have first world problems, but they are manageable. A few dollars here and there won't hurt any of us.
lenders.occupational_info: Esoterica

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I don't have much, but I want to help those are trying to help themselves and this seems like a great forum.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with the money in their business. I make sure all of the bills, taxes and employees are paid.

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is more a direct and personal way of making a difference.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.occupational_info: I attempt to find the most environmentally friendly approaches for companies to conduct projects (power lines, substations, etc.).  This involves me doing survey work in the field for sensitive species and writing reports to describe conditions and the necessary requirements to minimize the effect from construction as much as possible.

lenders.name: KEP
lenders.loan_because: it's the most direct way to help.

lenders.name: Cody
lenders.loan_because: "Money is like manure; it's not worth a thing unless it's spread around encouraging young things to grow." - Thorton Wilder
lenders.occupational_info: I study English at a university, and write fiction and poetry.

lenders.name: Charles
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in the world a little bit at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I give others a tool that they can use in both their private and professional lives to help make their lives better.

lenders.name: Emma Wan
lenders.loan_because: I know that I'm directly helping someone else.

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed and I want to share that blessing.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach science at a small high school.

lenders.name: Isaiah
lenders.loan_because: My aunt makes these loans for me so I can learn about other countries and ways of life. When I am 18 years old I will be able to use this money for my education or profession.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance to help themselves and Kiva helps provide that for millions of people all over the world.

lenders.name: James Heck III
lenders.loan_because:
"To those to whom much has been given much is expected."

I wish to empower entrepreneurs with an opportunity to realize their dreams.

lenders.name: Candace
lenders.loan_because: I feel like I can help. Hope is needed for everyone and it gives me hope to give.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with vacant homes for the government- trying to get someone to buy them and make them homes and not just empty buildings.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I'm grateful to be able to help out when people need aid in moving their livelihood ahead. This is a great way to connect to someone across the world and I look forward to hearing out the efforts are going.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a teacher of college students, and I raised my daughter pretty much on my own. She is now 26 years old (Lily). I like very much helping out other mothers.

lenders.name: Yi Zhang
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Charles
lenders.loan_because: If people need help and I can help them, why not?

lenders.name: Chris Sanders
lenders.loan_because: I've been unbelievably blessed, and I'm thrilled to be able to share my success with others.

lenders.name: Michael Pai
lenders.loan_because: I loan because the best way to help people out is to give them a try.  So many dreams are not met because there wasn't an opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a "green" advertising company.  The medium in which I provide ad space is done on plasma screens.  I'm currently in 2 driving ranges in Washington state.  My core client list is golf courses, because they share the same demographic as the golf ranges.  Everyone comes to the range before they go to the course.  An ideal location for a golf course to advertise at.  I'm trying to network the golf industry with digital signage and marketing.  Making golf, one step closer to becoming green.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others and because my faith challenges me to make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit organization that helps consumers and businesses.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: ...I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I help clean dirty water that is below ground.

lenders.name: Marilee
lenders.loan_because: I'm selfish!  I want to live in a healthy society.  When we leave people behind, no one really gets ahead.
lenders.occupational_info: I make sure computers have accurate information so people can find what they search for in libraries and on the Internet.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I wish to.
lenders.occupational_info: I do computer work at financial companies.

lenders.name: Brittany
lenders.loan_because: even though I don't have much at present, I can do a little that can have a big impact. This is a wonderful way to do my part, even as I pay for my own advancement.

lenders.name: Valerie
lenders.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office that permits industrial facilities. I help them prevent environmental pollution or reduce it to acceptable levels.

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunities to pursue their dreams.  In the United States we have so many opportunities to do this, but in other countries, though the start-up costs may be small, the ability to gather initial funds is hard.  I desire to support entrepreneurs who have a passion and a calling and whose lives might be changed by someone simply taking the first step with them.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: People need money more than I do
lenders.occupational_info: IT-EDU

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: Why not?
lenders.occupational_info: I make and publish comic books and comic strips on the internet and beyond.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I was blessed with the opportunity and means to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student in the field of Bioengineering - engineers who work to solve problems in living things.

lenders.name: Jeremy
lenders.loan_because: I'm sometimes blessed with people helping me out.  I give in return.

lenders.name: Gavrilo
lenders.loan_because: It's a good way to help people out on the long term.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: It is important to help those who are already helping themselves but need a little boost to take the next step.  I am focusing on Africa after spending 4 months in Rwanda with the Access Rwanda project.
lenders.occupational_info: I help design and analyze drug studies for cancer drugs.

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone who really needs it. Lately I've been upset by all of the greed and dishonesty when I read a newspaper and I feel the need to counter that $25 at a time!
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a small public library. My job is pretty much helping children and parents find appropriate books, helping students with homework and teaching people basic computer skills.

lenders.name: Phillip
lenders.loan_because: I have little else to do with my money, so it may as well help the less fortunate.

lenders.name: Abby
lenders.loan_because: All of the cows in the world need someone to take care of them. I want to help people care for their cows.
lenders.occupational_info: I love cows, purple and helping people. I really like to help people with cows.

lenders.name: Loulwa
lenders.loan_because: I believe we all need to help each other, even in the smallest way, to make a change in this world
lenders.occupational_info: I work with children who face all sorts of challenges

lenders.name: Mickey
lenders.loan_because: I care about making a difference to the world.  Because human potential is too beautiful to be wasted.  Because if you'll do the work to succeed, I'll loan you the money to make it possible.  Because I am so damned lucky, and I want to share that with everyone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I make computers do what people really want them to do--whether or not the people start out knowing what that is.  I help other people learn how to do the same thing.  I spend a lot of time sitting at my desk and thinking.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: With the world we all live in today I think, we have to help one another. If you want to start a business, I'm happy to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a the day to day operations of a company.

lenders.name: Garry
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher of  disabled students

lenders.name: Isabell
lenders.loan_because: I like to give people the opportunity to help themselves and improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Secretary for a bunch of Engineers.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I am trying to follow in the footsteps of someone who gave EVERYTHING for US.

lenders.name: Deidre
lenders.loan_because: I know what it's like to have a dream of bettering something that is broken and am finally in a position to do something about it.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a successful business woman who owns my own business that allows me to stay home with my family every day.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: website designer & presenter
